name: Get Out
description:
Get Out is an immersive horror experience in the first person where you will play Carl, a rather strange subject, who has just aroused after hearing strange noises coming from his television.

Features

  • Immersive survival experience, the only way to survive is to escape.
  • The whole scenario environment is interactive, it looks for clues, it searches for the truth.
  • The realistic environment will make you feel closer to terror.
  • Audio 3D to be able to feel inside the game.

Get Out is an indie horror game that is inspired by real events.
